attributes.action: encourage Blackpool Council to forget the casino.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Blackpool lost the Casino bid fair and square, Blackpool Council should now forget about the supercasino and concentrate on developing the town into the family orientated resort it was famous for. We need to urgently look for a Plan B. This may be legoland, Storm City, Rainforest Ventures or one of dozens of other ideas that have been shelved by Blackpool Council over the last 7-8 years.
